snippet: The cartoonist Bob Eckstein takes readers through each of the Rangers’ 10 trips to the Stanley Cup finals, beginning in 1928.
lead_paragraph: The cartoonist Bob Eckstein takes readers through each of the Rangers’ 10 trips to the Stanley Cup finals, beginning in 1928.

headline.main: The Rangers’ Adventures in the Stanley Cup Finals
headline.print_headline: The Rangers’ Adventures in the Stanley Cup Finals
